GSD.description:
x86: Annotate call_on_stack()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit e3c961c56ad522eaf2716afa42c59346675ee4b1. For more details please see the references link.
